description: PATH Unified Metrics Dashboard - comprehensive coverage of all PATH metrics

panels.description: Metric 1: Endpoint distribution by domain, rpc_type, service_id, tier_threshold, session_start_height. Published every 10 seconds as a leaderboard snapshot.

targets.expr: sum by(domain, rpc_type, service_id, tier_threshold, session_start_height) (path_reputation_endpoint_leaderboard{service_id=~"$service_id", domain=~"$domain", environment="$environment", rpc_type=~"$rpc_type"})

panels.title: 1. Reputation Endpoint Leaderboard

panels.description: Metric 2: Health check results by domain, rpc_type, service_id, health_check_name, and reputation_signal.

targets.expr: sum by(domain, health_check_name, reputation_signal) (rate(path_health_check_status_total{service_id=~"$service_id", domain=~"$domain", environment="$environment", rpc_type=~"$rpc_type"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: 2. Health Check Status

panels.description: Metric 3: Observation pipeline events by domain, rpc_type, service_id, network_type, method, and reputation_signal.

targets.expr: sum by(domain, service_id, reputation_signal) (rate(path_observation_pipeline_total{service_id=~"$service_id", domain=~"$domain", environment="$environment", rpc_type=~"$rpc_type"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: 3. Observation Pipeline

panels.description: Metric 4: Latency categorization by domain, rpc_type, service_id, and latency_signal (rabbit/normal/slow/very_slow/turtle).
panels.title: 4. Latency Reputation (rabbit/normal/slow/very_slow/turtle)

panels.description: Successful requests (HTTP 2xx)

targets.expr: sum by(service_id) (rate(path_requests_total{service_id=~"$service_id", domain=~"$domain", domain!="", environment="$environment", rpc_type=~"$rpc_type", rpc_type!="", status_code="200"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: 5a. Requests 2xx (Success)

panels.description: Client error requests (HTTP 4xx)

targets.expr: sum by(service_id) (rate(path_requests_total{service_id=~"$service_id", domain=~"$domain", domain!="", environment="$environment", rpc_type=~"$rpc_type", rpc_type!="", status_code="4xx"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: 5b. Requests 4xx (Client Errors)

panels.description: Server error requests (HTTP 5xx)

targets.expr: sum by(service_id) (rate(path_requests_total{service_id=~"$service_id", domain=~"$domain", domain!="", environment="$environment", rpc_type=~"$rpc_type", rpc_type!="", status_code="5xx"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: 5c. Requests 5xx (Server Errors)

panels.description: Metric 6: Retry events by domain, rpc_type, service_id, and reason (retry_on_5xx/retry_on_timeout/retry_on_connection).
panels.title: 6. Retries Distribution (by reason)

panels.description: Metric 7: Retry results grouped by service - success vs failure rate.
panels.title: 7. Retry Results (by service)

panels.description: Metric 8: Average batch size per service (how many relays per request).
panels.title: 8. Batch Size (avg per service)

panels.description: Incoming request bandwidth - bytes received from clients.
panels.title: 9a. Bandwidth - Requests (incoming)

panels.description: Outgoing response bandwidth - bytes sent to clients.
panels.title: 9b. Bandwidth - Responses (outgoing)

panels.description: All outgoing relays to suppliers (normal requests, health checks, probation traffic).
panels.title: 10. Relays Total (all outgoing relays)

panels.description: Relay latency p95 for outgoing requests to suppliers, grouped by service.
panels.title: 11. Relay Latency (p95 by service)

panels.description: Probation system activity: endpoints entering/exiting probation and requests routed to probation endpoints.
panels.title: 12. Probation Events (entered/exited/routed)

panels.description: Mean reputation score per service (0-100 scale). Higher is better.
panels.title: 13. Mean Reputation Score (by service)

panels.description: Suppliers blacklisted for signature/validation errors. Shows count of blacklist events.
panels.title: 14. Supplier Blacklist Events

panels.description: Suppliers with nil public keys (haven't signed first transaction yet).
panels.title: 15. Supplier Nil Pubkey Events

panels.description: RPC type fallbacks when suppliers don't support the requested RPC type.
panels.title: 16. RPC Type Fallback Events

panels.description: Request latency p95 for incoming requests, grouped by service.
panels.title: 17. Request Latency (p95 by service)

panels.description: Current number of active WebSocket connections.
panels.title: 18. WebSocket Active Connections

panels.description: WebSocket connection events: established, closed, failed.
panels.title: 19. WebSocket Connection Events

panels.description: WebSocket messages by direction (client to endpoint, endpoint to client).
panels.title: 20. WebSocket Messages

panels.description: WebSocket connection duration p95.
panels.title: 21. WebSocket Connection Duration (p95)

title: PATH Unified Metrics
